name: MATIONLite
0:
”Alexa, turn on mation lite”
”Alexa, turn on sleep”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
MATION Lite is an innovative management app for smart home gateway. With integrated Z-Wave wireless communication protocol, MATION Lite can easily connect, control and monitor a majority of electrical devices and home appliances including door locks, shades, lighting, power plugs, electronics and sensors. MATION Lite supports push notifications, and voice assistants such as Amazon Alexa and Google Home to make your life simpler.
Features:
• Support Z-Wave devices control, room control and scene control
• Support Amazon Alexa and Google Home
• Support Plug & Play IP cameras (specific IP camera models)
• Allow alarm notification for each Z-Wave device and each scene
• Plug & Play by ID/password
• Push notification on iPhone/iPad and Android for device and scene events
